scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); ['src'].forEach(dir => { try { require('child_process').execSync(\`find ${dir} -name '*.js' -type f\`, {encoding: 'utf8'}).trim().split('\\n').filter(Boolean).forEach(jsFile => { const tsFile = jsFile.replace(/\\.js$/, '.ts'); if (fs.existsSync(tsFile)) { fs.unlinkSync(jsFile); console.log('Deleted:', jsFile); }}); } catch(e) {} });"
